ygData.subject: Particle Weapon for Necro's
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok,  anyone know what it up with the uber weapon for Necro s?   I ve seen some on one chat list... This is a Snip from the last thing I found... 1. head to
ygData.messageBody:
Ok, anyone know what it up with the uber weapon for Necro's? I've seen
some on one chat list...

This is a Snip from the last thing I found...


1. head to Nektulos Forest and find the female NPC by the river
loc -1000 -700

2. head to Lake Rathe and find Kazen Facae loc 340 -1600

3. Kill Sir Edwin Motte (level 33 paladin). He is easiest to catch in tavern
by the docks in EFp where he is on a rotation with the bard and some others

4. Bring head of Motte to Kazen and recieve a symbol

5. Bring symbol to the chick in Nektulos Forest

6. Go to Najena and camp FBR and when you get it go to Nektulos Forest and
give FBR to chick and get a symbol and some moss

7. Give moss and symbol to Kazens apprentice in Lake Rathe then say symbol
of the serpent

8. go to Swamp of No Hope and find Ssessthrass loc 3800 1600 give him symbol
(the one you get from Kazens apprentice)

This is how far I got and as far as I will get in a long time because next
step involves venturing deep into Chardok which I can't do at my level :(

Tim.



Does anyone have any more info on this... ? I havent had a chance to even
start it yet but am really curious as to what they are gonna give us
necro's...

My personal choice ?

It gives us back Unresistable lifetap and removes all Nerfs back to start of
Game ! ! !! ! !

he he

Thanos Kinslayor, Human Necro the Rathe
